Name: Cave Digger VR
About the game: Cave Digger is now combined with the Riches DLC content. Experience the whole game in one tight package! Cave Digger is a mining adventure game, which takes place in a small town of an alternative western universe full of mystery, dark humor and numerous experimental tools for the brave miners! Gear up to explore the town and the depths of the mountain. Excavate the bedrock, reap the rewards of mother earth and trade the mined valuables for new gadgets. Features Explore the elevator shaft and the train tracks to four distinct underground levels, and find mysteries, riches and multiple endings 9 endings depending on the choices you make. Can you find them all? Upgrade your tools and the train to make them more effective… and shiny! A companion Chest to carry your loot and burden How much riches will be enough? Will you be able to stop? What happens if you don’t? The answers to these questions and more will be found as you dig deeper into the mines! Join our discord to chat with devs and community!
Meta Title: Cave Digger VR: May 9, 2018, VRKiwi and Full Overview
